metadata.title: CVE-2023-39368 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Protection mechanism failure of bus lock regulator for some Intel(R)Processors may allow an unauthenticated user to potentially enable denialof service via network access.

criterions.comment: intel-microcode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'trusty doesn't support early microcode loading at runtime').
